text:
Most contractors will be flexible to work with what you need. If not, I'd find a different one. As an agency, you already have enough moving parts going on to add one more if it can be avoided.

I used to be a contractor before I started my business as well and one thing I learned made my life easier back then was to always make it as easy as possible for them to pay me and invoice them in whatever way was easiest for them.
